summary: So we got ochadeku as the dog family Todomomo as the cat family Eraserjoke as the bird/cat family Jirounari as the rabbit family...
question: So we got ochadeku as the dog family Todomomo as the cat family Eraserjoke as the bird/cat family Jirounari as the rabbit family  Any I’m missing?

tags: the glass of water isnt actually that small his hands are just big
body:
He’s papa

Rappa, at his new job, in a suit: Yeah I can’t stay for extra hours today, I’ve got to watch the kids for my spouse.

Jeremy, from accounting: You got stuck with babysitting duty then, huh?

Rappa, casually sipping a tiny glass of water: No you fuckwad I’m just taking care of my kids and being a good dad, why the actual fuck would you call it babysitting when they’re mine? Both me and my spouse work all the damn time so go take your dumb white ass back home and go jerk off into a tissue like you do every night while us real men share the responsibility of parenthood and actual parenting! It’s not my fault your father never cared about yoy enough to spend actual quality time raising you but you should know that without a doubt that a dad’s job includes more than going to work and ‘bringing home the bacon’

Jeremy, sobbing:

blog.name: necroticmaster
blog.title: Your Time Has Come, Lost Soul

title: Teacher and Student (BNHA)
body:
Rating: T
Word Count: 682
Characters: Ayano Haruyama (S/I), Shouta Aizawa
Pairings: None
Summary: It’s after the first attack on U.A. Aizawa is in the hospital and Ayano comes to visit him.
Author’s Note: This was just supposed to be a drabble but it turned out longer than I thought.

Aizawa slowly opened his eyes. It took him a couple of seconds but the white ceiling soon reminded him that he was still in the hospital. His body was sore but with all of his medication the pain was manageable. He looked down at his own body and spotted a figure sitting on a stool next to his bed, their head and arms resting on top of the bed as they slept.

He slowly moved his leg and nudged the person awake. The person twitched and slowly sat up, their hair falling back and revealing their face. Aizawa recognised them as Ayano Haruyama, one of the students in his class.

“Ah you’re awake, teacher,” Ayano said casually as she lifted one hand to rub the sleep from her eyes.

“I could say the same to you, Haruyama. What are you doing here?” Aizawa asked her.

“I was worried about you. Out of everyone who got caught up in the attack you were the one who sustained the most injuries while protecting everyone.” Her eyes cast downwards and her shoulders hung low.

“I’m fine now. You don’t have to watch over me.” He didn’t quite know how to cheer her up, but if he could at least assure her that he was alright maybe he could help lessen that weight on her shoulders.

Ayano leaned down and pulled out a juice-box from her bag. “Do you have anyone to take care of you while you’re in this state?” she asked him as she stabbed the straw into the box and then held it out towards him.

Instinctively Aizawa tried to reach out to accept the juice-box before remembering that both of his arms were out of commission. He sighed and Ayano brought the straw to his lips to let him take a couple of sips.

“You’re my student. You don’t need to concern yourself with me when we’re out of class.”

“I guess not,” Ayano simply shrugged, not looking too bothered even though she had been brushed off so easily.

“Shouldn’t you check on your classmates instead of hanging around me?”

Ayano held out the juice-box once more, this time her gaze lingered on his lips even after lowering her hands.

“I… don’t want to be around groups of people right now…” She looked out through the window and into the distance. “And I just feel useless if I stay cooped up at home.”

“I notice that you’re by yourself a lot. You don’t talk much, even when the other girls are hanging out with you.”

Ayano’s eyes snapped back to Aizawa, her surprise evident on her face. “You noticed?”

“Don’t underestimate us teachers,” Aizawa sighed. “We pick up on things like that quite easily.”

He eyed the juice-box in her hands and she brought the straw to his lips for another sip. She then put down the juice onto his side-table and started to dig for something inside her bag. She soon pulled out a small container that she opened and then dipped her fingertip in. She leaned towards Aizawa and brought her hand towards his face.

“What the hell are you doing?” he snapped and leaned away from her.

“Your lips are chapped, teacher. Let me help you.”

Aizawa held still as she smoothed the moisturiser on his lips. He could detect a slight fragrance of chocolate and strawberries from her wrist and he found the scent comforting. But once her fingers left his face he decided to set his foot down.

“Alright, that’s enough. You should really leave now.”

Ayano stood up and grabbed the juice-box from the side-table. At first he thought she was about to give him one last sip but instead she brought the juice-box to her own mouth and wrapped her lips around the straw. She looked him straight in the eyes as she sucked on the straw until the telltale sound of an empty juice-box filled the room.

“Bye, Aizawa. I hope you have a speedy recovery.”

He watched her as she unceremoniously threw the empty juice-box into the trash and walked out the door.

Midoriya: Yo dude I just saw a post online saying we kissed
Bakugo: Yo dude that'd be weird, we'd never do that...
Midoriya,...
body:
Midoriya: Yo dude I just saw a post online saying we kissed

Bakugo: Yo dude that’d be weird, we’d never do that…

Midoriya, sweating: Haha yeah I’d never kiss you…

Bakugo: But like, if you ever… *eyebrows wiggle*

Midoriya: *starts choking*

tags: bakugou you know you feel things O.o
summary:
Kaminari, during a training exercise: Midoriya! Oi, Midoriya! Why isn’t he answering?
Todoroki: [with a straight face] He only...
body:
Kaminari, during a training exercise: Midoriya! Oi, Midoriya! Why isn’t he answering?

Todoroki: [with a straight face] He only answers to “Todoroki’s Husband.”

Kaminari:

Kaminari: When did you get so smooth oh my god–

Later

Midoriya: I wonder why Kacchan’s been asking Todoroki for pick up lines all evening.

title: Bonus Round of Prompts
body:
I’ve added promised Bonus Round of Prompts. Now you have three prompts, two in general theme, and one strongly writing theme, but you can use all of them into your own liking. Don’t feel restricted or forced to follow that particular rule. 

Please, enjoy!
